title: If anivia was a pokemon
body:
[](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ttlzKJKpunQ/VXdsY2rZ9gI/AAAAAAAArHA/PrDi3B1tL3U/s1600/AniviaLoadScreen.png)
She would be articuno.
https://media.giphy.com/media/L8bcxHvaGsHaE/giphy.gif
Hell, she is pretty much already articuno.

replies.body:
If Mei were a League of Legends champion, she'd be Anivia.

...does that mean if Articuno were an Overwatch hero, it would be Mei?
I personally think the Pokemon Dunsparce would be a better fit,
